Mini 1541: The Heart of Artificial Reality

A warm welcome to everyone here, and thank you all for joining!

To the townspeople and traitors alike...never underestimate the heart of artificial reality, and how knowledge and wisdom can conquer your darkest fears. Here we are...the ultimate goal is peace, peace at heart, peace in mind, self-acceptance, kindness...the reality is no longer artificial, it's real alright...there the nine people stand, in a dark cabin ripe with the smell of cedar...something is up, but what can you do about it?

Nine of you stand on the verge of breaking down and giving up, with puzzled looks...this is not the real world...rather a dark world, where you learn a lot about yourself, your family, and what life is about when you are away from home...you eliminate the variables of life and look within, to see and sort out the problems with a clear lens...your routine shall be intact, and now you must figure out who has been making your lives miserable outside of artificial reality...several within your own group are not who you think they are...

You must trust yourself, your instincts, and your zest for life...curiosity can make you a star, and the search for answers within your own group begins now...you may see a dearest friend turn on you, or show their true colors...alas, in the words of an old friend Ben, discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most...who will win out?

Rules (taken from fuzzybutternut and edited as needed)

Voting & Lynches

1 Please vote in bold (Vote: Fuzzy) or use the vote tags (VOTE: Fuzzy).
2 Please unvote in bold (Unvote:) or use the unvote tags (UNVOTE: : ). You do not 3 have to unvote before re-voting, but I would appreciate it if you did.
4 A lynch will occur when more than half the players are voting for someone.
5 A no-lynch will occur when more than half the players are voting for no-lynch.
6 Once a player is lynched, it will be twilight. You may still post as long as you were not lynched.
7 Once I post the post a flip for a player after the night officially ends and open the thread back up, then the next day begins.
8 At the day's end when the day's deadline has been reached, a no-lynch will occur if no more than half the players are voting for a player.

Posting & Communications

1 The Mod colors are red and green. You may only use these two colors if and only if you are not impersonating the moderator. If you are unsure whether or not your usage of these colors is breaking the rules, just pick another color!
2 You may PM me at any time and ask me anything (i.e. to get a rule clarification).
3 Do not quote PMs from me, especially Role PMs.
4 No out-of-thread-discussion is allowed unless I specifically allow it.
5 Do not edit or delete any of your posts.
6 After you are dead, you may have one bah post that contains no content whatsoever.
7 You may not post after a lynch scene or flip, no matter the circumstances (e.g. thread is left unlocked following lynch scene or flip).
8 Players cannot delete or edit any posts.
9 The thread will be locked under these circumstances: (1) after a lynch has been confirmed and a flip has been revealed or is in the process of being revealed. (2) the night phase is underway or ongoing. (3) Pre-game while the thread is being set-up, or post-game while final edits are being made.

Activity & Deadlines

1 Each day will be 2 weeks long (14 days). Deadlines will be specified at the beginning of each day and throughout each game day.
2 If at any point in the game a deadline is reached, and no player has enough votes to be lynched, then there will automatically be a no-lynch.
3 If you do not post within a 48 hour period (and have not declared a V/LA status), you will receive an in-game prod.
4 If you do not post within a 72 hour period (and have not declared a V/LA status), you will receive an PM prod.
5 If you do not post within 48 hours of a PM prod, you will be replaced, unless you post before I find a replacement.
6 If you have declared V/LA, you will be exempted from a prod during that time.

Etiquette

1 Please try to avoid vulgar language. Cursing is fine, I really don't care, but don't purposefully offend someone.
NO AD HOMINEM.. Attack the post, NOT the poster.
2 Please do not make any personal attacks. I will not punish you if you do, but I would appreciate it if you don't.
3 Follow the rules.
4 Have fun!

Vanilla Townie Role PM: You are a Vanilla Townie. All you have is your voice and vote! You are aligned with town and win when only members of the town remain. Please confirm your alignment and role via PM once you receive your role.

Welcome, everyone!

9/9 have confirmed.

The game begins now! Best of luck to all of y'all.
